text_elements.typography_notes: The calligraphic style may affect readability for non-native speakers.

symbol.description: Calligraphic Chinese characters with a small red seal

color_palette.contrast_notes: Good contrast between black and red on a light background.

issues.description: Calligraphic text may be hard to read for some audiences.

improvement_cues.suggestion: Consider a more legible font for broader appeal.

trend_alignment.notes: Aligns with trends favoring cultural authenticity.
